#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int T,n,sum[1005],ans;
int prim[1005],top,pd[1005];
void pre()
{
	int i,j;
	for(i=2;i<=1000;i++)
	   {if(!pd[i]) prim[++top]=i;
	    for(j=1;j<=top&&prim[j]*i<=1000;j++)
	       {pd[prim[j]*i]=1;
		    if(i%prim[j]==0) break;
		   }
	   }
	top=1;
	for(i=2;i<=1000;i++)
	   {if(prim[top]==i) {sum[i]=sum[i-1]+prim[top]; top++;}
	    else sum[i]=sum[i-1];
	   }
	//for(i=1;i<=30;i++) printf("%d ",sum[i]);
}
int main()
{
	pre();
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	   {scanf("%d",&n);
	    ans=sum[n]-sum[23];
	    if(ans<0) puts("0");
	    else printf("%d\n",ans);
	   }
	return 0;
}
